document_data.name: Zelanz
document_data.race: [[Human]]<ref group="note">While Zelanz' sex and race are not explicitly stated, the fact that either [[Kelemvor]], [[Cyric]], or [[Adon]] could pass as them as a member of the [[Company of Dawn]]'s adventuring charter, suggests he is a [[human]] male.
document_data.mainbody: '''Zelanz''' was a mercenary that served for a time as a member of the [[Company of Dawn]] adventuring group during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: When the Company of Dawn accompanied friends of their leader Thurbrand through [[Spiderhaunt Wood]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, the group suffered heavily casualties and were nearly all killed. Zelanz fell when a giant red spider dropped down from a tree and killed him alongside his fellow mercenary [[Welch]].
